Title: Provides that new passenger-type motor vehicles manufactured for sale in New York state on or after January 1, 2020 shall be offered for sale with a spare tire and jack
Summary: Provides that new passenger-type motor vehicles manufactured for sale in New York state on or after January 1, 2021 shall be offered for sale with a spare tire and jack.
LawCode: Add ยง198-d, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to providing that new passenger-type motor vehicles shall be offered for sale with a spare tire and jack
